title: BRIEF-IOOF Holdings Receives Variation To AFSL To Enable IIML RE/RSE Split
text:
BRIEF-IOOF Holdings Receives Variation To AFSL To Enable IIML RE/RSE Split

Stock Markets 39 minutes ago (Oct 28, 2019 10:56)

© Reuters. BRIEF-IOOF Holdings Receives Variation To AFSL To Enable IIML RE/RSE Split Oct 28 (Reuters) - IOOF Holdings Ltd : * RECEIVES VARIATION TO AFSL TO ENABLE IIML RE/RSE SPLIT * APPROVAL ENABLES CURRENT RE AND SERVICE OPERATOR FUNCTIONS OF IOOF INVESTMENT MANAGEMENT LTD TO BE TRANSITIONED TO IISL * HAS BEEN WORKING TOWARDS SEPARATION OF IIML RE AND RSE FUNCTIONS BY 31 DEC 2019 AND REMAINS ON TRACK TO COMPLETE THIS WORK * APPROVAL LEAVES IOOF INVESTMENT MANAGEMENT LTD AS A STANDALONE REGISTRABLE SUPERANNUATION ENTITY * IOOF HAS ALREADY COMMENCED IMPLEMENTING ASIC'S ADDITIONAL LICENCE CONDITIONS

BRIEF-IOOF Holdings Receives Variation To AFSL To Enable IIML RE/RSE Split
description: BRIEF-IOOF Holdings Receives Variation To AFSL To Enable IIML RE/RSE Split
